toolbox

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • toolbox.Time

  • public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    By calling the timing method every frame, it computes the delta time factor and the frame per sec value.
    See Also:
    timing(), getDeltaTimeFactor(), getFps()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int currentFps
      Current sec's fps value.
      private static float deltaTimeFactor
      Difference from the optimal FPS.
      private static int frameCount
      The number of elapsed frames.
      private static int lastFps
      Last sec's fps value.
      private static long lastLoopTime
      The time when the last frame rendered.
      private static long OPTIMAL_TIME
      One second divided into target FPS parts.
      private static int TARGET_FPS
      Target FPS.
      private static long updateLength
      Time elapsed since last frame.
      private static long updateLengthSum
      Sum of the update lengths until it reaches one sec.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private Time()
      To can't create Time instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static float getDeltaTimeFactor()
      Returns the delta time factor.
      static int getFps()
      Returns the frame per sec value.
      static int getFrameCount()
      Returns the number of elapsed frames.
      static double getTime()
      Retruns the elapsed time since the start.
      static void timing()
      It computes the delta time factor and updates the FPS value.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • updateLengthSum

        private static long updateLengthSum
        Sum of the update lengths until it reaches one sec.

      • lastLoopTime

        private static long lastLoopTime
        The time when the last frame rendered.

      • deltaTimeFactor

        private static float deltaTimeFactor
        Difference from the optimal FPS. If you multiply something (like movement or rotation) with this value every frame, it'll be FPS independent.

      • frameCount

        private static int frameCount
        The number of elapsed frames.

    • Constructor Detail

        private Time()
        To can't create Time instance.

    • Method Detail

      • timing

        public static void timing()
        It computes the delta time factor and updates the FPS value.

      • getDeltaTimeFactor

        public static float getDeltaTimeFactor()
        Returns the delta time factor. If you multiply something (like movement or rotation) with this value every frame, it'll be FPS independent.
        Returns:
        delta time factor

      • getFps

        public static int getFps()
        Returns the frame per sec value.
        Returns:
        fps

      • getTime

        public static double getTime()
        Retruns the elapsed time since the start.
        Returns:
        the elapsed time since the start (in seconds)

      • getFrameCount

        public static int getFrameCount()
        Returns the number of elapsed frames.
        Returns:
        the number of elapsed frames
